description: Show commit hash and last author on each line of a file. See git blame, which is preferred over git annotate. git annotate is provided for those familiar with other version control systems. More information: https://git-scm.com/docs/git-annotate.

useCases.description: Print a file with the author name and commit hash prepended to each line:
Print a file with the author email and commit hash prepended to each line:
